text: by now I'm sure you all know about the
earthquake that is devastated Haiti the
first 48 hours after a natural disaster
are the most critical UNICEF is on the
ground right now working hard to provide
the children who are affected with
things they need to survive like food
and shelter and clean water but we need
your help so please stop whatever you're
doing to visit UNICEF USA org to make a
donation you please join me in praying
for all of those who are affected thank
you so much for your support
